subject: Energy Jobs Update: Current Postings
body:
Dear Daily Power Report Subscriber:


We are pleased to make available to you the current issue of the PowerMarketers.com  Energy Jobs Update. 

To download your copy of The Energy Jobs Update,
Click Here

 
Get new job postings every day at:  http://www.powermarketers.com/pmajobs.htm

**Employers!  Reach 60,000+ energy execs in each issue of The Energy Jobs Update -- This is your target audience.  Click here for rates and to enter your job posting online.PowerMarketers.com · PO Box 2303 · Falls Church · VA · 22042 This email was sent to ktwarwic@speedy.uwaterloo.ca by PowerMarketers.com.Unsubscribe | Privacy Policy
